languages.text: {n}Соломон морщится.{/n} "Глейто, разве ты не мог уважить Вольного Торговца менее глубоким укусом? Не вините его, это был стандартный предупредительный захват, тем более весьма чистый — понадобится всего десяток швов".

{n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон морщится.{/n} "Глейто, разве ты не мог уважить Вольного Торговца менее глубоким укусом? Не вините его, это был стандартный предупредительный захват, тем более весьма чистый — понадобится всего десяток швов".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは眉をひそめた。{/n}「グライト、ローグトレーダーに敬意を示して、もう少し軽く噛みついてやることはできなかったのか？まあ、彼を責めないでください。あれは標準的な警告のための噛みつきでしたし、傷口もかなりきれいなものです。せいぜい12針も縫えば済むでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは眉をひそめた。{/n}「グライト、ローグトレーダーに敬意を示して、もう少し軽く噛みついてやることはできなかったのか？まあ、彼を責めないでください。あれは標準的な警告のための噛みつきでしたし、傷口もかなりきれいなものです。せいぜい12針も縫えば済むでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Glaito, hättest du {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} nicht die Ehre eines leichteren Bisses gewähren können? Ihr solltet ihm das nicht übelnehmen. Das war eine Standardaktion zur Warnung und noch dazu ziemlich sauber – höchstens zwölf Stiche, würde ich sagen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Glaito, hättest du {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} nicht die Ehre eines leichteren Bisses gewähren können? Ihr solltet ihm das nicht übelnehmen. Das war eine Standardaktion zur Warnung und noch dazu ziemlich sauber – höchstens zwölf Stiche, würde ich sagen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Glaito, tu aurais pu éviter de mordre {mf|le libre-marchand|le libre-marchande} aussi fort, tout de même ! Enfin, ce n'est pas sa faute. Il s'agit là d'une morsure d'avertissement standard, tout ce qu'il y a de plus réglementaire. Vous n'aurez besoin que d'une douzaine de points de suture. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Glaito, tu aurais pu éviter de mordre {mf|le libre-marchand|le libre-marchande} aussi fort, tout de même ! Enfin, ce n'est pas sa faute. Il s'agit là d'une morsure d'avertissement standard, tout ce qu'il y a de plus réglementaire. Vous n'aurez besoin que d'une douzaine de points de suture. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne arruga el entrecejo.{/n} «Glaito, ¿no podrías honrar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente con un mordisco menos bestia? En fin, tampoco le puede culpar. Ha sido un tiento de advertencia, y bastante limpio, he de admitir; solo necesitará una docena de puntos de sutura».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne arruga el entrecejo.{/n} «Glaito, ¿no podrías honrar {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente con un mordisco menos bestia? En fin, tampoco le puede culpar. Ha sido un tiento de advertencia, y bastante limpio, he de admitir; solo necesitará una docena de puntos de sutura».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙皱起了眉。{/n}“格雷托，你就不能给行商浪人点面子，下口轻点吗？嗯，这也不能怪它。这是个标准的警告，而且伤口也很整齐，只要缝上十几针就好了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙皱起了眉。{/n}“格雷托，你就不能给行商浪人点面子，下口轻点吗？嗯，这也不能怪它。这是个标准的警告，而且伤口也很整齐，只要缝上十几针就好了。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Glaito, Hür Tacir'i daha hafif bir ısırıkla onurlandıramaz mıydın? Neyse, onu suçlayamazsınız. Bu standart bir uyarı ısırığıydı, oldukça da temizdi. On kadar dikişle halledilmeyecek şey değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Glaito, Hür Tacir'i daha hafif bir ısırıkla onurlandıramaz mıydın? Neyse, onu suçlayamazsınız. Bu, standart bir uyarı ısırığıydı ve oldukça da temizdi. Bir düzine dikişle halledilmeyecek şey değil."

languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne frowns.{/n} "Glaito, couldn't you honour the Rogue Trader with a lighter bite? Well, you shouldn't blame him. That was a standard warning hold, and pretty clean, too — you will only need a dozen stitches."
